Container.Name: wallabag
Container.Overview: [h3]wallabag[/h3]wallabag is a self hostable application for saving web pages. Click, save, read it when you want. It saves the content you select so that you can read it when you have time.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]Be sure to change the Host port from [span style='color: #E80000;']80[/span] to [span style='color: #E80000;']something else[/span] as [span style='color: #E80000;']80[/span] is the port unRAID uses for its web interface.[/b][br][br] [b]/var/www/wallabag/db[/b] : this path is where wallabag will store it's database file which contains data for users, articles, and configuration.[br] Initial username and password are [b]wallabag[/b]
Container.Description: [h3]wallabag[/h3]wallabag is a self hostable application for saving web pages. Click, save, read it when you want. It saves the content you select so that you can read it when you have time.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]Be sure to change the Host port from [span style='color: #E80000;']80[/span] to [span style='color: #E80000;']something else[/span] as [span style='color: #E80000;']80[/span] is the port unRAID uses for its web interface.[/b][br][br] [b]/var/www/wallabag/db[/b] : this path is where wallabag will store it's database file which contains data for users, articles, and configuration.[br] Initial username and password are [b]wallabag[/b]
